radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace pleural effusions bilaterally, pericardial effusion, normal liver in signal intensity and morphology, simple cyst or biliary hamartoma in segment VI, moderate intrahepatic and extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation (common bile duct measuring up to 11 mm), mild narrowing of the right and left hepatic ducts, gallbladder distended with mild wall edema, millimetric stones in gallbladder lumen, normal pancreas, kidneys with 1.6 cm T1 hyperintense cyst in left kidney, other subcentimeter hemorrhagic cysts in both kidneys, unremarkable gastrointestinal tract and lymph nodes.
